name: Pauldrons of Akkhan
flavorText: "Let the crusaders armor their flanks in plate of incredible strength, for their path is dangerous, and death will come at them from all sides." -Akkhan
flavorTextHtml: "Let the crusaders armor their flanks in plate of incredible strength, for their path is dangerous, and death will come at them from all sides." -Akkhan

primary.textHtml: +[91 - 100] Resistance to All Elements

setDescription:
(2) Set:     
 Reduce the cost of all abilities by 50% while Akarat's Champion is active.(4) Set:     
 Reduce the cooldown of Akarat's Champion by 50%.(6) Set:     
 While Akarat's Champion is active, you deal 2000% increased damage and take 50% less damage.
